alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 4:45PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. The best chance of moderate to heavy snow will be from 6 PM and 10 PM moving from west to east. The snow is expected to end by around 2 AM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the this evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be banded in nature and will be very heavy at times. In combination with the strong wind, visibility may be reduced to less than 1/4 mile at times. Significant blowing and drifting snow will also occur.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River
